sense.def:
Kadar je človek
nervous
, je zaskrbljen in prestrašen; to se kaže tudi v njegovem vedenju.

seg.quote: Both actors were exceedingly nervous on the day of the performance.
‘Pa,’ Rudolph began, trying to conquer his nervousness.

sense.def:
Kdor je
nervous
, je zelo napet in se hitro razburi.

seg.quote: She was a particularly nervous woman.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
nervous about something
, je zaradi nečesa prestrašen ali zaskrbljen.

seg.quote: He's nervous of thieves in that little shop of his.

sense.def:
Bolezen ali stanje, ki je
nervous
, prizadene duševno stanje.

seg.quote: She had suffered a lot of nervous strain.
